main event: A blue-white object was observed in Warren, Ohio, on July 6, 7, or 8, 1947.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a diameter of 8-14 inches,The sighting occurred at 2200 hours,It was noted that the object traveled from the northeast,The object was observed making a downward course of 300 degrees and landed,No known discovery of the object was reported.
witness description: Civilian source, details on individuals not provided
